Struct table_t¶

  • Defined in File types.h

Struct Documentation¶

struct table_t¶

A 4D lookup table on a grid used in ICON.

Public Functions

codi::RealReverse get(uint64_t i, uint64_t j, uint64_t k, uint64_t l) const¶

Get the value at a given index.

Parameters

  • i: Index along vector 1

  • j: Index along vector 2

  • k: Index along vector 3

  • l: Index along vector 4
